mapper.select: SELECT t.todo_id AS todoId, t.content, t.start_date AS startDate, t.due_date AS dueDate, u.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_thumbnail_url AS userThumbnailUrl FROM todo t JOIN user u ON t.writer_id = u.user_id WHERE t.team_id = #{teamId} AND t.writer_id = #{userId} AND t.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY t.due_date ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
